answers.answer: I had preeclampsia during my pregnancy. my doctors were able to tell by the amount of protein in my urine, my over the top high blood pressure and all the swelling I had.

I had preeclampsia with my first son. My blood pressure was out the roof and I was retaining water to a whole nother level. Take care of that now. I unfortunately had louver failure and my son was born at 30 weeks. Now at 5 yrs old he is perfectly healthy
Get checked for It mama. I just delivered a healthy baby girl 23 days early by c section because I had it. Swelling is a major sign so is vision changes and,headaches. It's not fun

question: Any mom's been diagnosed with preemclampisa while pregnant? How did they figure it out? What were the signs of having it?
title: preemclampisa
